ygData.subject: RE: Well I think it is a new item for jewelers if any o ut there
ygData.msgSnippet: Ummm, you will quickly achieve a poor reputation for yourself if you continue to sell moonstones for 10pp each.  This is not a new item, and it is not really
ygData.messageBody:
Ummm, you will quickly achieve a poor reputation for yourself if you
continue to sell moonstones for 10pp each. This is not a new item, and it
is not really rare either...and yes it can be used for a quest, but the
rewards for the quest are no where near 10pp each. You got lucky that time,
but people will catch on.

Faras Tar'Linedhel
E'ci

-----Original Message-----
From: Thomas Mahn [mailto:lawman@...]
Sent: Thursday, August 05, 1999 2:15 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Well I think it is a new item for jewelers if any out
there


I found a moonstone in qeynos. If ya all need it read below



S
P
o
il
e
r





SPACE #*$(#^%#^#*^$#&^%#&^%#&^#&%&#^%(#&^




Ok so you must like spoilers:) I am a bard of teh 15 circle of enlightenment
and i did the gnoll fang quest in qeynos. Hey they were sitting in the bank
collecting dust. I was expecting to receive a few cp but to my surprise fer
every fang turned in you get a moonstone. Now this is a new item to me and
all the jewelers in town at the time. I did not let them know how to obtain
because aminly , THEY WERE NOT BARDS heheheheh. But i sold two fer 10 plat a
piece. Not bad fer killing a gnoll. If any body knows what these can ya let
me know:)


Tribe
Wrath of Dragonclaw Clan currently UNKNOWN GUILD on prexus
